description: Template for value selection UI components like dropdowns, multi-selects, and autocomplete fields. Used in filter controls to allow users to select from a list of available values. Values can be loaded from static lists or dynamic queries.

query_returns_schema_id.description: GTS identifier of the values schema that this selector expects. Defines the structure of value/label pairs returned by the values query. Used to populate dropdown options, multi-select items, and autocomplete suggestions.
